quests.desc: You are now playing a exciting session of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First stop, try to head north. After that, move west. Then, travel south. And then, make absolutely sure that the bureau inside the study is open. After opening the bureau, pick up the passkey from the bureau in the study. Got that? Good!

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a study.

 You make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] bureau.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The bureau contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The bureau is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. A standard one.



 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a parlor. The room is well lit.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just fallen into a scullery. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a basement. A standard kind of place.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Ah, the bedroom. This is some kind of bedroom, really great standard vibes in this place, a wonderful standard atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it. Let's see what's in here.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a kitchenette. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedchamber. A standard one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You've entered a shower.



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You're now in a studio. The room is well lit.

 You can make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] case in the corner.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The case contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The case is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south.

infos.desc: it's a manageable portal [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

objective: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your first objective is to make an effort to go to the north. After that, make an attempt to go west. And then, try to move south. Then, ensure that the bureau in the study is open. And then, retrieve the passkey from the bureau inside the study. Alright, thanks!

main_quest.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your first objective is to make an effort to go to the north. After that, make an attempt to go west. And then, try to move south. Then, ensure that the bureau in the study is open. And then, retrieve the passkey from the bureau inside the study. Alright, thanks!
